sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PDF_G205Y ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CASH_CARD_SEIL_NUM , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , FTYR_TOT_AMT , FTYR_MARKET_TOT_AMT , FTYR_TMONEY_TOT_AMT , PRE_TOT_AMT , PRE_MARKET_TOT_AMT , PRE_TMONEY_TOT_AMT , DAT_CD , USE_PLACE_CD , FIRST_TOT_AMT , SECOND_TOT_AMT , FIRST_YEAR_TOT_AMT , SECOND_YEAR_TOT_AMT , INQR_STRT_MM , INQR_END_MM , CASH_CARD_SUM , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #cashCardSeilNum# , #formCd# , #resid# , #name# , #ftyrTotAmt# , #ftyrMarketTotAmt# , #ftyrTmoneyTotAmt# , #preTotAmt# , #preMarketTotAmt# , #preTmoneyTotAmt# , #datCd# , #usePlaceCd# , #firstTotAmt# , #secondTotAmt# , #firstYearTotAmt# , #secondYearTotAmt# , #inqrStrtMm# , #inqrEndMm# , #cashCardSum# , #pdfDatAppYn# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PDF_G205Y SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , CASH_CARD_SEIL_NUM=#cashCardSeilNum# , FORM_CD=#formCd# , RESID=#resid# , NAME=#name# , FTYR_TOT_AMT=#ftyrTotAmt# , FTYR_MARKET_TOT_AMT=#ftyrMarketTotAmt# , FTYR_TMONEY_TOT_AMT=#ftyrTmoneyTotAmt# , PRE_TOT_AMT=#preTotAmt# , PRE_MARKET_TOT_AMT=#preMarketTotAmt# , PRE_TMONEY_TOT_AMT=#preTmoneyTotAmt# , DAT_CD=#datCd# , USE_PLACE_CD=#usePlaceCd# , FIRST_TOT_AMT=#firstTotAmt# , SECOND_TOT_AMT=#secondTotAmt# , FIRST_YEAR_TOT_AMT=#firstYearTotAmt# , SECOND_YEAR_TOT_AMT=#secondYearTotAmt# , INQR_STRT_MM=#inqrStrtMm# , INQR_END_MM=#inqrEndMm# , CASH_CARD_SUM=#cashCardSum# , PDF_DAT_APP_YN=#pdfDatAppYn# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CASH_CARD_SEIL_NUM , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , FTYR_TOT_AMT , FTYR_MARKET_TOT_AMT , FTYR_TMONEY_TOT_AMT , PRE_TOT_AMT , PRE_MARKET_TOT_AMT , PRE_TMONEY_TOT_AMT , DAT_CD , USE_PLACE_CD , FIRST_TOT_AMT , SECOND_TOT_AMT , FIRST_YEAR_TOT_AMT , SECOND_YEAR_TOT_AMT , INQR_STRT_MM , INQR_END_MM , CASH_CARD_SUM , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_G205Y

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CASH_CARD_SEIL_NUM , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , FTYR_TOT_AMT , FTYR_MARKET_TOT_AMT , FTYR_TMONEY_TOT_AMT , PRE_TOT_AMT , PRE_MARKET_TOT_AMT , PRE_TMONEY_TOT_AMT , DAT_CD , USE_PLACE_CD , FIRST_TOT_AMT , SECOND_TOT_AMT , FIRST_YEAR_TOT_AMT , SECOND_YEAR_TOT_AMT , INQR_STRT_MM , INQR_END_MM , CASH_CARD_SUM , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_G205Y WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PDF_G205Y WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
